translation.discover_new_arrivals_text: Uncover the latest trends and exclusive deals on our top products. Upgrade your style today!
translation.contact_us_message: We'd love to hear from you! Please fill out the form below or reach us through the contact details provided.
translation.thank_you_for_contacting: Thank you for reaching out! We'll get back to you soon.
translation.title: Title
translation.has_been_added_to_the_cart: has been added to the cart.
translation.how_do_i_place_an_order: How do I place an order?
translation.place_an_order_answer: To place an order, select the items you want to purchase, add them to your cart, and proceed to checkout.
translation.can_i_modify_my_order_after_placing_it: Can I modify my order after placing it?
translation.modify_order_answer: Once an order is placed, it cannot be modified. However, you can contact our customer service to request changes.
translation.shipping_options_answer: We offer standard, express, and next-day shipping options. You can choose your preferred option at checkout.
translation.track_my_shipment: How can I track my shipment?
translation.track_my_shipment_answer: You can track your shipment using the tracking number provided in your shipping confirmation email.
translation.return_policy_answer: Our return policy allows you to return items within 30 days of receipt. Please ensure items are in their original condition.
translation.how_to_return_item: How do I return an item?
translation.return_item_answer: To return an item, please follow the return instructions included with your order or contact customer service for assistance.
translation.create_an_account: How do I create an account?
translation.create_an_account_answer: Click on the 'Sign Up' button on the top right corner, fill in your details, and submit the form to create an account.
translation.reset_password: How can I reset my password?
translation.reset_password_answer: On the login page, click 'Forgot Password' and follow the instructions to reset your password via email.
translation.accepted_payment_methods_answer: We accept major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.
translation.use_multiple_payment_methods: Can I use multiple payment methods?
translation.use_multiple_payment_methods_answer: Currently, we only accept one payment method per order.
translation.payment_initiation_error: An error occurred during payment initiation. Please try again.
translation.confirm_clear_cart: Are you sure you want to clear the cart?
translation.please_login: Please log in to your account
translation.signup2: Don't have an account? Sign Up
translation.login2: Already have an account? Log in
translation.contact_us2: We would love to hear from you! Please fill out the form below or reach us through the provided contact information.
translation.newsletter_description: Sign up to receive updates and exclusive offers.
translation.copyright: © 2024 E-commerce. Design & Develop with ❤️ by Moustafa.
translation.2fa_enabled: 2FA is enabled. You will be asked for a second factor when logging in.
translation.permanently_delete_account: Permanently delete your account and all of your content.
translation.sales_increase_text: Sales have increased by 20% in the last quarter, showing positive growth trends.
translation.efficiency_improvement_text: Operational efficiency improved by reducing process time by 15%.
translation.satisfaction_increase_text: Customer satisfaction ratings have increased to 90% this month.
translation.enter_new_url_or_leave_empty: Enter a new URL or leave empty to keep the current image
